name: Grilled Chicken Breasts with Heavenly Balsamic Glaze
description: Medium heat, subtle spice and the sweet balsamic glaze are a match made in culinary heaven! Chicken breast is a lean protein powerhouse. It’s low in fat, high in protein, and a great source of essential nutrients like B vitamins and zinc, helping you to maintain a healthy lifestyle. Shake on a sodium-free topper, like Everything Bagel Whole Food Topper or Poke Bowl Topper Blend, to complete the dish!
preparation: Rub both sides of each chicken breast with Rub.
Grill over medium-high heat on barbecue for 4–5 minutes per side, or until instant-read thermometer indicates the Food Safe internal temperature of 170° F (77° C).
Meanwhile, prepare glaze by combining vinegar and sugar in a small saucepan and bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
Reduce heat and simmer until glaze is reduced by half: approximately 1⁄4 cup.
Remove chicken from grill, place on serving plate and brush with Heavenly Balsamic Glaze.
tips: • Drizzle over sliced strawberries for a unique dessert.
• Drizzle over pieces of Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese for a delicious Italian treat.
